data.name: RoboSquare - Fizzostia Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Want some customization items that set you apart from others? Do you want to do that while repping Fizzostia? Well now you can do both by wearing this amazing Fizzostia bundle of customization items!

Bundle Includes:
  • Fizzostia Wheels [with Trails]
  • Fizzostia Body
  • Fizzostia Blade
  • Fizzostia Topper

NOTE: You must restart your game to receive these items!
